concept.title: Sample Email Notification
concept.shortdesc: Adobe recommends sending an email to your users after you have been notified about your upgrade date.

conbody.p: Subject: Important changes to your SiteCatalyst Reports
Attachment: SiteCatalyst 15 Feature Overview (download using this link and attach the PDF to the email).
Good news! As of <upgrade date>, all SiteCatalyst report suites will upgrade to the SiteCatalyst 15 platform. SiteCatalyst 15 offers many new features, including:

ul.li: Full subrelations enabled on all conversion reports by default
Improved metric calculations for more accurate analysis
And much more, outlined in the attached Feature Overview

conbody.p: With this change you should be aware that the improved metric calculations in SiteCatalyst 15 might affect your current reports, as outlined here:

ul.li: The Visits metric now includes visitors without a visitor ID cookie. This change typically increases Visits, and also affects any calculated metrics that rely on the Visits metric, such as Success Events per Visit.
Time Spent metrics more accurately calculate a visitorâ€™s time spent on a page. This change typically increases Time Spent metric.
Unique Visits and Unique Visitors metrics in classification reports no longer duplicate visitor counts. This change reduces the reported number of unique visits and visitors to a website.
Orders and other metrics on merchandising eVars is similarly not duplicated on SiteCatalyst 15. This change may reduce the reported metrics on merchandising eVar reports.

conbody.p: Carefully review the attached SiteCatalyst 15 Feature Overview for more information about the data processing changes in SiteCatalyst 15. Direct any questions or concerns you might have to <SiteCatalyst Administrator>.
